translation.zh: 傻瓜布丽奇特

translation.en: -You haven't only just met her. -No.
translation.zh: -你不是刚认识她-嗯

translation.en: No, I got to know her pretty well
translation.zh: 我很了解她了

translation.en: when we were in the New York office together.
translation.zh: 从我们在纽约办公室一起工作的时候

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.zh: 操

translation.en: There's no easy way to say this...
translation.zh: 不知道怎么说好 但是…

translation.en: But I want you to be the first to know that...
translation.zh: 我希望你是第一个知道的

translation.en: We're engaged.
translation.zh: 我们订婚了

translation.en: [Bridget] At times like this, continuing with one's life seems impossible,
translation.zh: 在这种时候 坚持活下去 真的好难

translation.en: and eating the entire contents of one's fridge seems inevitable.
translation.zh: 把冰箱吃空倒是不可避免的

translation.en: I have two choices.
translation.zh: 我有两个选择

translation.en: To give up and accept permanent state of spinsterhood
translation.zh: 放弃挣扎 然后认了这剩女的命

translation.en: and eventual eating by Alsatians,
translation.zh: 最后尸体被狗吃掉

translation.en: or not, and this time I choose not.
translation.zh: 或者不认命 这次我选择了后者

translation.en: I will not be defeated by a bad man and an American stick insect.
translation.zh: 我才不会被一个英国臭男人和一个美国竹竿精打败

translation.en: Instead, I choose vodka.
translation.zh: 作为代替 我选择了伏特加

translation.en: And Chaka Khan.
translation.zh: 还有夏卡康的歌

translation.en: Why do you want to be in television?
translation.zh: 你为什么想进电视台？

translation.en: Well, I've realized that I've become deeply committed
translation.zh: 因为我想献身于

translation.en: to communicating to the public the up-to-the-moment and in-depth news,
translation.zh: 即时的、有深度的大众传播 TVC新闻

translation.en: both political and ecological.
translation.zh: 从政治和生态两方面

translation.en: What do you think of the El Niño phenomenon?
translation.zh: 你对厄尔尼诺现象怎么看？

translation.en: Um, it's a blip.
translation.zh: 是个短暂的问题

translation.en: I think basically Latin music is on its way out.
translation.zh: 基本上 我认为拉丁音乐快落伍了

translation.en: So why do you want to work in television?
translation.zh: 所以 你为什么想进电视台？

translation.en: Because I'm passionately committed to communicating with children.
translation.zh: 因为我致力于与儿童交流

translation.en: -They are the future. -Do you have any children of your own?
translation.zh: 当青少年来敲门 -他们就是未来-你有小孩儿吗？

translation.en: [groans in disgust] Christ, no.
translation.zh: -他们就是未来-你有小孩儿吗？ 天哪 没有

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: [man] So, why do you want to work in television?
translation.zh: 你为什么想进电视台？

translation.en: I've got to leave my current job because I've shagged my boss.
translation.zh: 英国关注 因为跟老板上了床 所以必须辞职

translation.en: Fair enough. Start on Monday. We'll see how we go.
translation.zh: 好极了 周一开始来上班然后看合作怎么样

translation.en: And, incidentally at Sit Up Britain
translation.zh: 顺便说下 在《英国关注》

translation.en: no one ever gets sacked for shagging the boss.
translation.zh: 没人因为睡了老板被辞退

translation.en: That's a matter of principle.
translation.zh: 这是原则性问题

translation.en: Bridge, come on.
translation.zh: 布丽奇 别这样

translation.en: I know it's been awkward as arse, but there's no need to leave.
translation.zh: 我知道尴尬得要死但是没必要辞职啊

translation.en: No, actually there is. I've been offered a job in television.
translation.zh: 不 有必要 我已经找到电视台的工作了

translation.en: -Television? -Mmm.
translation.zh: 电视台？

translation.en: And they want me to start straightaway.
translation.zh: 而且他们想要我马上过去上班

translation.en: So I've got to leave in about... Ooh, three minutes.
translation.zh: 所以我大概3分钟后就得走了

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: Would you just... Just hold it right there, Miss Jones?
translation.zh: 你等等 琼斯小姐

translation.en: I'm sorry to inform you, but I think you will find that by contract
translation.zh: 很抱歉我得提醒你根据劳动合同的规定

translation.en: you are expected to give at least six weeks' notice.
translation.zh: 你必须提前6周通知公司

translation.en: Ah, yes, well, I thought with the company being
translation.zh: 你必须提前6周通知公司 是的 但是我觉得

translation.en: in so much trouble and all,
translation.zh: 既然公司面临这么多危机

translation.en: you wouldn't really miss the person who
translation.zh: 你不会在意

translation.en: "waltzes in, in a see-through top and fannies about with the press releases."
translation.zh: 一个穿着透视上衣假装忙发布会的人

translation.en: -Bridget. -I want to hear this.
translation.zh: -布丽奇特-我倒要看看

translation.en: Because if she gives one inch,
translation.zh: 因为如果她有一丁点让步

translation.en: I am going to fire her bony little bottom anyway for being totally spineless.
translation.zh: 我也要开除她这种没骨气的女人

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I just think you should know that, um,
translation.zh: 我觉得你应该知道

translation.en: there are lots of prospects here for a talented--
translation.zh: 这里对于有才能的人来说有很多可能

translation.en: -Daniel. -Just give me a minute, would you, Simon?
translation.zh: -丹尼尔-先等一下 好吗 西蒙？

translation.en: -Thanks. -Right, boss man.
translation.zh: -谢谢-好的 老板

translation.en: Lots of prospects for a person who, uh,
translation.zh: 会有很多机会

translation.en: you know, perhaps for personal reasons has been
translation.zh: 也许因为一些私人原因

translation.en: slightly overlooked professionally.
translation.zh: 她的专业技术被忽视了

translation.en: Thank you, Daniel. That is very good to know.
translation.zh: 谢谢你这么说 丹尼尔

translation.en: But if staying here means working within 10 yards of you,
translation.zh: 但是留在这儿就意味着在你很近的地方工作

translation.en: frankly, I'd rather have a job wiping Saddam Hussein's arse.
translation.zh: 老实说 我宁愿去给萨达姆擦屁股

translation.en: Well, bye, everyone.
translation.zh: 大家再见

translation.en: Oh, just sod off.
translation.zh: 都他妈散了

translation.en: [man] [on TV] Hello and welcome to Sit Up Britain, a current affairs show...
translation.zh: 大家好 欢迎收看《英国关注》时事节目

translation.en: Okay, everybody, it is bonfire night and we are on fire.
translation.zh: 好的 今晚是篝火之夜我们也干得热火朝天

translation.en: We have live fire station feeds from Newcastle,
translation.zh: 我们的消防站现场报道来自纽卡斯尔

translation.en: Swansea, Sheffield, and Lewisham just poised for tragedy.
translation.zh: 斯旺西 谢菲尔德和刘易舍姆我们时刻为火灾准备着

translation.en: Bridget Jones, where are you?
translation.zh: 布丽奇特琼斯 你在哪儿？

translation.en: I'm here, Richard.
translation.zh: 《英国关注》在刘易舍姆 我在这儿 理查德

translation.en: Put on some more make-up. I want you on camera.
translation.zh: 化下妆 我要你出镜

translation.en: I'm thinking miniskirt, I'm thinking fireman's helmet.
translation.zh: 我想就穿迷你裙 戴消防帽

translation.en: I want you pointing a hose, I want you sliding down the pole
translation.zh: 我要你指着消防水管从消防滑竿上滑下来

translation.en: and then go straight to the interview.
translation.zh: 然后直接开始采访

translation.en: Great. I'll do it.
translation.zh: 好的 我就这么干

translation.en: No problem. Fine. Right.
translation.zh: 没问题 好的

translation.en: So, you drop into the shot, and then interview Chief Fireman Bevan.
translation.zh: 你直接滑下来然后采访消防局长贝文

translation.en: Yep. Yep. Yep. Go, go. Go, go. Go!
translation.zh: 好的 开始！

translation.en: -Go? -Oh, no.
translation.zh: -开始？-噢 不

translation.en: We're going to fire-fighters in Newcastle first.
translation.zh: 要先播纽卡斯尔的消防员

translation.en: Stop! Climb back up! Climb back up!
translation.zh: 停！爬回去！

translation.en: -On you in 30 seconds. -Okay.
translation.zh: -30秒内就到你-好

translation.en: Neville, what the fuck is going on?
translation.zh: 内维尔 怎么回事？

translation.en: She's supposed to be sliding down the pole, not climbing up it.
translation.zh: 她应该从滑竿上滑下来 不是爬上去

translation.en: -Go, go. Go, go. Go! -Oh! Okay!
translation.zh: -开始！-好的！

translation.en: Oh, Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: 我的天哪

translation.en: Okay, we're out of time. Just wind her up.
translation.zh: 我们没时间了 让她尽快结束

translation.en: Well, that seems to be about all we've got time for down here in Lewisham.
translation.zh: 好 刘易舍姆差不多就到此为止

translation.en: Chief Officer Bevan, thank you very much.
translation.zh: 贝文长官 非常感谢您

translation.en: Excellent fire station.
translation.zh: 非常棒的消防站

translation.en: And now back to the studio.
translation.zh: 现在我们把时间交给总台

translation.en: [Bridget] Excellent. Am national laughingstock.
translation.zh: 真是棒极了 我成了全国人民的笑料

translation.en: Have bottom the size of Brazil
translation.zh: 有巴西那么大的屁股

translation.en: am daughter of broken home, am rubbish at everything, and...
translation.zh: 家庭破裂 一事无成 而且…

translation.en: Oh, God, am having dinner with Magda and Jeremy.
translation.zh: 天哪 我得和马格达和杰里米吃晚饭

translation.en: The only thing worse than a smug, married couple,
translation.zh: 比和一对自以为是的夫妇吃饭更糟糕的是

translation.en: lots of smug, married couples.
translation.zh: 和很多自以为是的夫妇吃饭

translation.en: Right, everyone, this is Bridget.
translation.zh: 大家好 我是布丽奇特

translation.en: Bridge, this is Hugo and Jane. And obviously you know Cosmo and Woney.
translation.zh: 布丽奇 这是雨果和简你已经认识科兹摩和旺妮了

translation.en: -Hi, Bridge. -Hi, Bridge.
translation.zh: -你好-你好

translation.en: -This is Alastair and Henrietta. -Hello.
translation.zh: -阿拉斯泰尔和汉丽埃塔-嗨

translation.en: -Julia and Michael. -[both] Hey.
translation.zh: -朱莉娅和迈克尔-嘿

translation.en: -Joanne and Paul. -[both] Hello.
translation.zh: -乔安妮和保罗-你好

translation.en: And Jeremy's partners from chambers, this is Natasha Glenville and Mark Darcy.
translation.zh: 还有杰里米事务所的合伙人娜塔莎和马克

translation.en: -Hi, there. -Hello.
translation.zh: -嗨-嗨

translation.en: -Not in your bunny-girl outfit today? -No.
translation.zh: -今天怎么没穿兔女郎衣服？-没有

translation.en: We bunnies only wear our tails on very special occasions.
translation.zh: 我们兔子只在非常特殊的场合才戴尾巴

translation.en: -Right, B. Sit yourself down. -Right.
translation.zh: -好 布 坐吧-好的

translation.en: Hey, Bridge, how's your love life?
translation.zh: 嘿 布丽奇 感情生活怎样？

translation.en: Still going out with that publishing chappie?
translation.zh: 还跟那个出版社的哥们儿约会吗？

translation.en: Uh, no, no, actually.
translation.zh: 没在一起了

translation.en: -Never dip your nib in the office ink. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 永远别搞办公室恋情

translation.en: Right. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: You really ought to hurry up and get sprogged up, old girl.
translation.zh: 你真的得赶紧结婚生子了 老姑娘

translation.en: Time's a running out. Tick-tock.
translation.zh: 时间不多啦 过得飞快呢

translation.en: Yes. Yes.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: Tell me, is it one in four marriages that ends in divorce now or one in three?
translation.zh: 现在是4对有1对离婚还是3对有1对？

translation.en: One in three.
translation.zh: 3对里就有1对

translation.en: Seriously, that office is full of single girls in their 30s.
translation.zh: 说实话 公司里上30岁的剩女一大堆

translation.en: Fine physical specimens, but they just can't seem to hold down a chap.
translation.zh: 样貌都挺好的 但是就是抓不住一个男人

translation.en: Yes, why is it there are so many unmarried women in their 30s these days, Bridget?
translation.zh: 对啊 布丽奇特 为什么这么多女人30多了还不结婚？

translation.en: Oh, I don't know.
translation.zh: 我怎么知道

translation.en: I suppose it doesn't help that underneath our clothes,
translation.zh: 我想不可避免的是在我们的衣着之下

translation.en: our entire bodies are covered in scales.
translation.zh: 整个身体都处于巅峰 也无济于事

translation.en: I very much enjoyed your Lewisham fire report, by the way.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢你在刘易舍姆的消防报道

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Yeah, well.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: It didn't work out with Daniel Cleaver?
translation.zh: 你跟丹尼尔克里维尔分手了？

translation.en: No, it didn't.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I'm delighted to hear it.
translation.zh: 很高兴听到这个消息

translation.en: Look, are you and Cosmo in this together?
translation.zh: 你和科兹摩是串通好了的吗？

translation.en: I mean, you seem to go out of your way to try to make me feel
translation.zh: 每次见到你 你总是不遗余力地

translation.en: like a complete idiot every time I see you,
translation.zh: 让我觉得自己是个彻底的傻瓜

translation.en: and you really needn't bother.
translation.zh: 真的不用再麻烦你了

translation.en: I already feel like an idiot most of the time anyway,
translation.zh: 大多数时候我已经觉得自己是白痴了

translation.en: with or without a fireman's pole.
translation.zh: 不管有没有消防滑竿这一出

translation.en: That will be my taxi. Goodnight.
translation.zh: 我叫的出租车到了 晚安

translation.en: Look, um, I'm sorry if I've been...
translation.zh: 真对不起 如果我…

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I don't think you're an idiot at all.
translation.zh: 我一点都不觉得你傻

translation.en: I mean, there are elements of the ridiculous about you.
translation.zh: 你有时确实很搞笑

translation.en: Your mother's pretty interesting.
translation.zh: 你妈妈也是很有趣

translation.en: And you really are an appallingly bad public speaker.
translation.zh: 而且你真是个差到令人震惊的主持人

translation.en: And you tend to let whatever is in your head
translation.zh: 你习惯性地想什么

translation.en: come out of your mouth without much consideration of the consequences.
translation.zh: 就说什么 完全不考虑后果

translation.en: I realize that when I met you at the turkey curry buffet
translation.zh: 我知道在火鸡咖喱自助餐遇到你的那次

translation.en: that I was unforgivably rude and wearing a reindeer jumper
translation.zh: 我不但非常没礼貌还穿了件驯鹿毛衣

translation.en: that my mother had given me the day before.
translation.zh: 是我妈前一天给我的

translation.en: But the thing is...
translation.zh: 但是…

translation.en: What I'm trying to say, very inarticulately is
translation.zh: 我想说的是 很难表达清楚的是…

translation.en: that, in fact, perhaps, despite appearances,
translation.zh: 也许 坦白地讲 除去这些表象

translation.en: I like you very much.
translation.zh: 我非常喜欢你

translation.en: Apart from the smoking, and the drinking, and the vulgar mother,
translation.zh: 除开抽烟 喝酒 低俗的老妈子

translation.en: -and the verbal diarrhea. -No, I like you very much just as you are.
translation.zh: -还有口无遮拦-不 我就喜欢你本来的样子

translation.en: Mark, we really are making progress on the case in here.
translation.zh: 马克 这个案子我们有了新的突破

translation.en: Jeremy's had a most brilliant idea.
translation.zh: 杰里米有了一个非常好的想法

translation.en: Right. Right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I must go, because...
translation.zh: 我得走了 因为…

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: "Just as you are"? Not thinner? Not cleverer?
translation.zh: 你本来的样子？ 不是再瘦点？不是再聪明点？

translation.en: Not with slightly bigger breasts and a slightly smaller nose?
translation.zh: 不是胸再大点鼻子再小点？

translation.en: Well, fuck me.
translation.zh: 去他的

translation.en: But this is someone you hate, right?
translation.zh: 但这是你讨厌的人 对吧？

translation.en: Yes, yes, I hate him.
translation.zh: 是啊 我讨厌他

translation.en: [Bridget] November 9. Weight: 138 pounds.
translation.zh: 11月9日体重：63公斤

translation.en: Cigarettes: Three. Birthday: 33.
translation.zh: 香烟：3支生日：33岁

translation.en: Okay, Bridget. See if you can get it right this time.
translation.zh: 布丽奇特 看你这次能不能搞定

translation.en: The verdict in the Aghani-Heaney case is expected today.
translation.zh: 阿克汉尼-希尼案今天宣判

translation.en: Get yourself down to the high court. I want a hardheaded interview.
translation.zh: 你去高等法院 我想要一场严肃冷静的采访

translation.en: -You do know the Aghani-Heaney case? -Yes, of course.
translation.zh: -你知道阿克汉尼-希尼案吧？-当然啦

translation.en: Big case
translation.zh: 大案子

translation.en: featuring someone called "Aghani-Heaney."
translation.zh: 主角是阿克汉尼-希尼

translation.en: Or two people called Kafir Aghani and Eleanor Heaney?
translation.zh: 或者是两个人 叫阿克汉尼和希尼

translation.en: That's the one. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 就是他们

translation.en: She's a British aid worker. He's a Kurdish freedom fighter.
translation.zh: 她是个英国救援人员他是个库尔德自由卫士

translation.en: The government want to extradite him home where he will certainly be executed.
translation.zh: 政府想把他引渡回国那样的话 他肯定会被处决

translation.en: She's married to him, and they've fought for five years to keep him here.
translation.zh: 她嫁给了他 为了让他能留下来打了5年官司

translation.en: -Today is the decision. -That's exciting.
translation.zh: -今天就是判决日-那很刺激啊

translation.en: Yes, it is. So what are you waiting for?
translation.zh: 是啊 那你还在等什么？

translation.en: [Bridget] Am suddenly hardheaded journalist
translation.zh: 我突然就成了严肃冷静的记者

translation.en: ruthlessly committed to promoting justice and liberty.
translation.zh: 坚定的促进和平与自由

translation.en: Nothing can distract me from my dedication to the pursuit of truth.
translation.zh: 没什么能干扰我追求真实

translation.en: Well, almost nothing.
translation.zh: 嗯 没有任何事情

translation.en: Right. I'll just pop to the shop quickly for some ciggies.
translation.zh: 好 我很快地去店里买点烟

translation.en: 14p for the Polos and a packet of Wheat Crunchies.
translation.zh: 14便士的波洛烟 一包麦酥饼

translation.en: -[Mark] A packet of Embassy, please. -I'm sorry. I'm not quite.
translation.zh: -请给我一包大使烟-不好意思 我还没点…

translation.en: Good afternoon.
translation.zh: 下午好

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: You like me just the way I am.
translation.zh: 你喜欢我本来的样子

translation.en: -Sorry? -Nothing.
translation.zh: -什么？-没什么

translation.en: Bridget, we fucked up utterly.
translation.zh: 布丽奇特 我们彻底完了

translation.en: Eleanor Heaney and Kafir Aghani have come and gone.
translation.zh: 阿克汉尼和希尼来了又走了

translation.en: Oh, God. I'll be sacked.
translation.zh: 天哪 我会被开的

translation.en: -Did the others get interviews? -I don't know. I was having a slash.
translation.zh: -其他人采访了吗 ？-我不知道 我去上厕所了

translation.en: -Actually, nobody got interviews. -So how do you know?
translation.zh: -其实没人做了采访-你怎么知道？

translation.en: Because I was defending him and I told him not to give any interviews.
translation.zh: 因为我是他的辩护律师我让他不要接受任何采访

translation.en: Look, I have a plan.
translation.zh: 我有个想法

translation.en: And action.
translation.zh: 开始

translation.en: Mr. Darcy, you were defending Mr. Aghani. You must be delighted.
translation.zh: 达西先生 你为阿克汉尼先生辩护肯定感到荣幸吧

translation.en: Yes, Kafir Aghani has spent his entire life
translation.zh: 是的 卡菲尔阿克汉尼的一生

translation.en: defending the basic human rights of his own people,
translation.zh: 都在捍卫他族人的基本人权

translation.en: and today's verdict has been the result of five years of struggle by this woman
translation.zh: 今天的判决是这位女士抗争了5年的结果

translation.en: Eleanor Heaney to save the man she loves from
translation.zh: 埃莉诺希尼为了拯救她所爱之人

translation.en: an extradition order that would've been tantamount to a death sentence.
translation.zh: 不被引渡回国接受死亡审判

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好的
